author: schneiml
body:
To shorten the discussion around issue #22576, here is a proposal.

We planned something in this direction from the beginning, but decided to stick with the style of the old tracker DQM packages to keep the consistency.

This PR is likely to break a few WF that depend on the Phase1Pixel DQM in a nonstandard way (I vaguely remember some stuff in HLT DQM), since the config needs to be adapted for the new package names. Lets see.

@fabiocos @fioriNTU
title: Restructure PixelPhase1 DQM packages
